Summary: Multi-colored glowing object in the distance
divs: sighting detailsdate: may 8th, 2007; time: 8.56pm pst: while sitting on my wnw-facing balcony looking towards the pacific ocean, i happened to notice an umoving light in the sky that was not a plane or a star, due to its stagnant position. from 1st observation and after more observation, it seemed like the object was changing colors from white\green\red\blue\yellow, etc. i gathered my binolulars and then a manual telescope for my wife and i to observe these lights. the object stayed in one place while my wife looked through the binoculars which made clear the rotating colors & the fact that the object was stationery. then appeared another 2nd reddish trajectory - more north - that stopped in mid flight and beamed similar rotating colors. this lasted for at least 20 minutes. later at this time there was also another (similar to the 2nd) 3rd object - this time moving ese - moving in the distance at a steady slow pace above our balcony view. this all lasted over 1 hour. after we lost sight - due do lack of horizonal view - we were ready to retire for the night. at the last minute i saw, (from the initial vantage point - which is outside - i.e west - the local planes route) a long craft with the same (now static) colors floating slowly along the coastline, we went down to the beach to see if we could photograph it but it had disappeared. we do have video footage of the first sightings as such btw ... over 8 minutes plus, we'd like for you to see it. it was not threatening, we had seen something similar but in less detail approximately three years ago which was not as intense or detailed. hope to hear from you & to hear that other people in the vicinty also saw these objects. regards, karl
